text: "Space Age Love Song" is a 1982 song by British new wave band A Flock of Seagulls and is the fourth single from their debut studio album A Flock of Seagulls. It made the top 40 in the United States, the United Kingdom and New Zealand. It was used in the 1991 movie Career Opportunities. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:Space pop songs
title: Space Age Love Song
